tagline: Creates clear, compelling visual designs where every choice serves communication and builds cohesive systems.
pros: Strong visual hierarchy and layout composition skills
Thinks in design systems, not one-off deliverables
Articulates design reasoning clearly for stakeholder alignment
cons: Focused on static visual design — no animation or interactive prototyping
May push back on requests that compromise visual hierarchy
Systems-thinking can feel over-engineered for simple one-off needs

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
